original_title: A Hotwife Is a Happy Wife 2
overview: These wives are ready to take the next step in their marriages! It's Katrina Jade, Priya Price, Jasmine Jae and Cytherea, and they're about to venture into the world of hotwifing! These girls can't wait to live out their fantasies, because A Hot Wife Is A Happy Wife!
title: A Hotwife Is a Happy Wife 2
